title: Pixel Plays Randomly After Leaving Car
content:
I will regularly listen to podcasts or Pandora on my Pixel through USB while driving (it's via Android Auto).  I shut my vehicle off, remove the Pixel from the USB cord and go about my way.

At a random point thereafter (I've tried timing it and get different intervals), my phone will pick up playing whatever I left off listening to.  This problem seems to be app agnostic as it will happen with PocketCast, Pandora, or anything else I'm randomly using.

Is there maybe a setting I'm missing? Is this a known bug?  It's more of an annoyance than a problem, but definitely something that shouldn't be happening.

Any help would be appreciated.
